column1: #Text=Katara says : " I wonder what crazy thing they 're trying to do now .
#Text=" Sokka says : " The general 's gone crazy !
#Text=He 's trying to force Aang into the Avatar State !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Good ... bird ... horse thingy ... " Fong says : " Maybe you can avoid me ... but she ca n't .
#Text=" Katara says : " I ca n't move !
#Text=" Aang says : " Do n't hurt her !
#Text=" Fong says : " You could save her if you were in the Avatar State !
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm trying ... I 'm trying !
#Text=" Fong says : " I do n't see glowing !
#Text=" Aang says : " You do n't need to do this !
